NEED SOME HELP HERE !!! - so, I patched the game o wave 3 - like I do to all wave 4 games before and all works - but this one asks for an updade, I do the update and this became a loop - update - boot - update boot - and nothing - any solution for that, tahnks for any help

@ pqp

I had the same problem with Dauntes Inferno and a couple other games, heres the fix. 

You need to make another iso with the original wave 4 and update it with a wave 4 iso, the loop is in the conversion. I was able to put my harddrive on my sons box to update mine now all my games work.

@pqp2005

Well i have also patch the game to wave 3, But i didnt get any update. Do have the latest dashboard (2.0.8955.0)? .

People below like geelad1212 are demented.

If you play ANY game before their release date (which is also tagged in the hash of the rip), it gets stored in your secdata.bin file.

It doesn't matter if you aren't connected to the internet on your 360. The next time you do, you will be banned.

Secdata.bin is compared to live server release date. It calculates how many days ago you played it. If before release date, you get 'This console has been banned from xbox live'.

Stop being an idiot and play games after the release date only (if you want to play online on the console too)

is it at all possible to play this and other games on an un-modded 360 now that you can use flash drives with it?

@faux360: Yes you can play without a mod!  Just patch a Wii into the 360 via USB cable, microwave your backup for 3 minutes in the microwave, then put it into the Wii.

The Wii will boot it and it will play on your 360!
